episodes.title: Awesome: Pastor vs. Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
Watch this newest footage of a conversation between Jeff Durbin and Zach Conover from Apologia Church with two Jehovah's Witnesses on a beach in Kauai. This is an excellent example of a loving, respectful, and meaningful conversation that can take place between Jehovah's Witnesses and Christians. 

You can get more at http://apologiastudios.com. Be sure to like, share, and comment on this video. #ApologiaStudios

You can partner with us by signing up for All Access. When you do you make everything we do possible and you also get our TV show, After Show, and Apologia Academy. In our Academy you can take a course on Christian apologetics and learn how to witness to Mormons. 

Follow us on social media here:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/apologiastudios?lang=en

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/apologiastudios/?hl=en

episodes.title: Pastor Lovingly Confronts Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
This must be seen and shared. This is a powerful moment in which Pastor Jeff Durbin speaks with two Jehovah's Witnesses while out doing street evangelism. Jehovah's Witnesses deny the biblical gospel and the biblical God. When Jeff walks up to them, they already knew who he was. This is what happened. 

You can get more content at http://apologiastudios.com. When you sign up for All Access you partner with our ministry and make these videos possible. Thousands of people have been delivered from the cults through these videos. You also get every TV show, After Show, and Apologia Academy. You can participate in our apologetics academy and learn how to minister to the cults.

Sign up today!

episodes.title: Jeff Durbin argues with two Jehovah's Witnesses: Part one
episodes.description: 1st audio clip of Jeff Durbin of "Apologia Christian Ministries" reasoning from the Scriptures with two Jehovah's Witnesses.http://defendthefaith.org/
